description:
After a very bland breakfast, Zagan realizes he has no idea what people normally eat. Nephy offers to make him a homecooked meal, and the two set off to buy ingredients from a nearby town. However, financial troubles and highwaymen prevent smooth travel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: First Love with Social Anxiety Taste a Lot Like Moldy Bread
Komyu Shou no Hatsukoi wa Kabita Pan no Aji ni Nite Iru
Le premier amour d’un introverti laisse un goût affreux en bouche
コミュ障の初恋はカビたパンの味に似ている
